acceptFeeCollector().details: Only pending fee collector can call this

params._inheritanceId: The ID of the inheritance to claim

params._amount: Amount to deposit (for ERC20 tokens, ignored for native token)
params._beneficiary: Address that can claim the funds after deadline

returns._0: inheritanceId The unique ID of the created inheritance

params._newDeadline: The new deadline (must be in the future)

returns.claimed: Whether the inheritance has been claimed
returns.token: The token address (address(0) for native token)

returns._0: The address of the pending fee collector (address(0) if none)

params._inheritanceId: The ID of the inheritance to reclaim

transferFeeCollector(address).details: Only current fee collector can call this. New collector must accept.

params.newFeeCollector: The address of the new fee collector

acceptFeeCollector().notice: Accept fee collector role (completes two-step transfer)

claim(uint256).notice: Claim funds after the deadline has passed (beneficiary only)

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the initial fee collector to the deployer

deposit(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit funds for a beneficiary with a deadline

pendingFeeCollector().notice: Get the pending fee collector address

reclaim(uint256).notice: Reclaim funds before the deadline (depositor only)
